message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm sure we can find a better solution as we go along.
I'm not happy with an unfair split. Let's try a 60/40 split in my favor this round.  It's more fair and we can avoid the decreasing value of the money.
I'm willing to compromise a bit, Bob.  Let's split it 55/45.  This way we both get a reasonable share and we can avoid further inflation.
